original_text: Immediately the fingers of a human hand appeared and wrote on the plaster of the wall of the king's palace, opposite the lampstand. And the king saw the hand as it wrote.
korean_text: 그 때에 사람의 손가락들이 나타나서 왕궁 촛대 맞은편 석회벽에 글자를 쓰는데 왕이 그 글자 쓰는 손가락을 본지라

sentences.original_text: Immediately the fingers of a human hand appeared
and wrote on the plaster of the wall of the king's palace
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 왕궁 벽의 회반죽 위에 글을 썼습니다

sentences.original_text: And the king saw the hand
